basics.name: Jonathan Sloan
basics.summary: Certified Linux system administrator with experience in the daily operations, support, and maintenance of Linux operating systems.

work.summary: H&R Block the leading tax experts.
highlights: Assist in developing, and documenting company standards for Chef.
Assist in design, and maintaining our pipelines.
Write many inspec profiles.
Work with many teams to help guide in writting cookbooks, and inspec profiles.
Plus all previous responsibilities.

work.summary: H&R Block the leading tax experts.
highlights: Manage internal systems that are required for daily operations.
Work with multiple different teams across H&R Block to accomplish company goals & projects.
On-call 24/7 as the primary engineer for many solutions.
Support Linux & Windows operating systems.
Troubleshoot a multitude of issues and services.

work.summary: Codero a web hosting company based out of Overland Park Kansas. They offer everything from cloud computing to high-performance dedicated servers.
highlights: Supported Customers via Phone, Live Chat, and Support Tickets.
Supported Linux & Windows operating systems.
Supported cPanel/WHM & Plesk control panels.
Troubleshoot multitude of issues and services.

work.summary: A2 Hosting a web hosting company based out of Ann Arbor Michigan. They offer everything from a basic website to high-performance dedicated servers.
highlights: Supported Customers via Phone, Live Chat, and Support Tickets.
Helped to document procedures and policies, regarding compromised accounts and IP blacklistings.
Monitored Exim mail queues and logs for spam and other malicious activity using nagios.
Monitored our IP addresses for blacklistings and handled them based on our policies.
Reviewed accounts for abusive behavior and proceeded accordingly per our procedures and or policies.
Worked with 3rd party companies to take down malicious sites.
Created bash scripts to help automate and obtain information from logs.

work.summary: A2 Hosting a web hosting company based out of Ann Arbor Michigan. They offer everything from a basic website to high-performance dedicated servers.
highlights: Supported Customers via Phone, Live Chat, and Support Tickets.
Migrated client cPanel accounts internally, and externally.
Assisted customers with pre-sales and sales questions.
Provided server-side support for hosting services.

education.area: Computer Information Systems concentrated in Cyber Defense
